text: Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Sate, watashi wa omo ga anata gata ni taishi kinji rareta koto o, dokuju shiyou. Kare ni nanimono demo dōisha o hai shite wa naranai. Ryōshin ni kōkōdeare. Konkyū suru no o osorete, anata gata no shijo o koroshite wa naranai. Ware wa, anata gata mo kare-ra o mo yashinau monodearu. Mata kō ke demo kakurete ite mo, minikui koto ni chikadzuite wa naranai. Mata, arrā ga shinsei-ka sa reta seimei o, kenri no tame igai ni wa satsugai shite wa naranai. Ko no yō ni kare wa meiji rareta. Osoraku anata gata wa rikai surudearou
